title: Heuristic Approach-Based Health Education Intervention Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Health Education Program Planning Experience or Management Competency
context.additional_context: Participants access collaborative tools and learning materials via smartphones, developing practical health education interventions through project completion

learning_goals: Ability to explain core phases of health education intervention design (analysis, design, evaluation) applying heuristic approaches
Capability to plan project-based intervention activities based on learner needs analysis results
Design of health education resources implementable solely via smartphones in limited technological environments
Evaluation of intervention proposals incorporating peer feedback and suggestion of improvement directions

resources: Mobile-Friendly Collaboration Tools (Google Docs, Padlet, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
